channel.title: Til on Today I learned
channel.description: Recent content in Til on Today I learned

item.title: Linux
item.description: Most of the notes are from LinuxNotesForProfessionals Terminal = text input/output environment Console = physical terminal Shell = command line interpreter hostname - Display hostname of the system who - List of all the users currently logged in as a user. w - Display current system status, time, duration, list of users currently logged in on system and other user information. last - Who recently used the system.
